posts.post_content:

I only got one reply to this the first try.  We made a deal very quickly and easily.

I'd love to add some tougher backs.  I'm even interested in the tougher backs like Carolina Brights, and Broad Leaf 350.  

If you have some mid-tier backs you could sell and need some money for REA, please let me know.  I am paying strong prices!

Bump! 

Paying/trading well for Tolstois I need, Cycle 460 and American Beauty 460.
Want to give this old thread a bump.  Still need some of the tougher 150-350 Series Old Mills as well.
